      • method

        public de.unisb.cs.st.javaslicer.common.classRepresentation.ReadMethod[] method

      • interruptedControlFlow

        public boolean[] interruptedControlFlow
        true if this frame was aborted abnormally (NOT by a RETURN instruction), or catched an exception. In both cases, the control flow was interrupted, so the stack entry indexes cannot be computed precisely any more.
